snippet: Estudiantes chairman Juan Sebastian Veron signed an 18-month contract with his club as a player on Wednesday, officially coming out of retirement at the age of 41....
lead_paragraph: Estudiantes chairman Juan Sebastian Veron signed an 18-month contract with his club as a player on Wednesday, officially coming out of retirement at the age of 41.

headline.main: Veron Returns to Action for Estudiantes at Age 41
headline.print_headline: Veron Returns to Action for Estudiantes at Age 41
